legacy.full_text: President Xi Jinping attended the 30th #APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting. How to usher in another “golden 30 years” for Asia-Pacific cooperation? The answer lies in innovation-driven, open, green and inclusive development. https://t.co/nYVpgdBKMV

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: Good morning, Mumbai! Ironically, smog, surely suffering health, is a "good" indicator, indicating the fast development of economy, which actually is welcome by almost everyone. Smog is just a reminder, reminding people that development dose not come with no cost. https://t.co/OXFqAlC75w

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: Only when those costs are noticed and taken care of, would sustainability be possible.

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: President Xi Jinping  pointed out that the Taiwan question remains the most important and most sensitive issue in China-U.S. relations.  China will realize reunification, and this is unstoppable.(9/n) https://t.co/atPXi2oQsJ

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: First, jointly developing a right perception. The two countries could be partners that respect each other and coexist in (4/n) https://t.co/0YscJXILMU

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: Fourth, jointly shouldering responsibilities as major countries. The two sides should keep their initiatives open to each other or coordinate and connect them for synergy to the benefit of the world.(7/n) https://t.co/Rzki1dj3Ky

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: Fifth, jointly promoting people-to-people exchanges. (8/n) https://t.co/CRl5IScDos

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: The world is big enough to accommodate both countries, and one country’s success is an opportunity for the other.(3/n) https://t.co/v2qoIzKreF

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: President Xi Jinping noted that there are two options for China and the U.S. in the era of global transformations unseen in a century: One is to enhance solidarity and cooperation and join hands to meet global challenges and promote global security and prosperity; ...（1/n） https://t.co/ugoR0hkvYU

legacy.description: Official account of the Consul General of the People’s Republic of China in Mumbai
legacy.name: Kong Xianhua

legacy.full_text: ... and the other is to cling to the zero-sum mentality, provoke rivalry and confrontation, and drive the world toward turmoil and division. The two choices point to two different directions that will decide the future of humanity and Planet.(2/n) https://t.co/77SQS8Gjeg
